original: Ramadan

Soon it is the ninth month of our calendar and Muslims worldwide are preparing for a month of fasting. It is one of the Five Pillars of Islam and is fard (obligatory) for all adult Muslims who are not ill, traveling or pregnant. From dawn until sunset no food is to be consumed, no liquids drunk, no tobacco used and no sexual relations allowed. It is a time of spiritual reflection, improvement and increased devotion and worship, no God-fearing Muslim should ignore Ramadan.
translation: 临近伊斯兰历第九个月，即拉玛丹月，众穆斯林正忙于预备斋月。封斋节欲除了是五功之一，更是一项主命，除长幼、孕妇与病患外之穆斯林皆须恪守。期间，自晓至夕，穆斯林不可饮食、吸烟或欢好。敬畏真主之穆斯林皆不应忽略斋月——这是一段清心节欲、反躬自省并坚定信仰的时间。

original: It is time to fast
Ignore it
Eid al-Fitr

The Feast of Breaking the Fast marks the end of Ramadan and Muslims around the world try to show a common goal of unity. Some believe that the feast is Fard (obligatory), Mustahabb (strongly recommended, just short of obligatory) or mandoob (preferable). All Muslims should forgive and forget any differences with others or animosities that may have occurred during the year.
translation: 开斋节，象征斋月结束，也是世界穆斯林共同追求团结的一天。有人甚至认为庆祝该节，是一项主命、圣行或可嘉之行。期间，穆斯林皆应不究既往、不计前嫌地与他人同乐。

original: Celebrate it for three days and invite everyone!
Celebrate it for two days
Celebrate it for one day
Invited to Eid al-Fitr

The ruler of $FROMCOUNTRY$ has invited an emissary of our realm to celebrate the Feast of Breaking the Fast which marks the end of Ramadan. The feast will be celebrated for three days and all that is asked of us is to forgive and forget any differences with others or animosities that may have occurred during the year.
translation: $FROMCOUNTRY$ 君主邀请我们王国的一个使者前往该国庆祝开斋节，以象征斋月结束。庆典将持续三日，期间可无所拘泥，只须不究既往、不计前嫌地与大家尽情同乐。

original: Fine
Hajj

Every able-bodied Muslim who can afford to go on Hajj is required to do so at least once, it is a religious duty and one of the Five Pillars of Islam. It is a pilgrimage to Mecca and all male pilgrims dress in the ihram, to show equality of all pilgrims in front of God as there is no difference between a prince and a pauper. The pilgrims do not shave, clip their nails, wear perfume, swear or quarrel, have sexual relations, uproot or damage plants, kill or harm wild animals, cover the head or the face and hands, marry, wear shoes over the ankles, or carry weapons. As the ruler of $COUNTRY$ and being an able-bodied Muslim, it is time to set an example and begin the Hajj.
translation: 家境允许并身体健全之穆斯林皆须在有生之年朝觐一次，以达成宗教义务和五功之最。朝觐指到麦加朝圣，其中受戒期间所有男性必须穿着戒衣，以示真主之前人人平等，并无王公与贫民之分。而且，开戒前亦不准断发、修甲、用香、盖头、藏手、穿靴、拔草、损木、杀生、秽语、争吵、欢好、结婚或持兵.身为$COUNTRY$元首，朝觐又是能力所及，应当身体力行以树立榜样。

original: Mecca awaits!
Not now!
The Rituals of Hajj

The many rituals of Hajj include Tawaf, where the pilgrims visit the Kaaba and walk around it seven times counter-clockwise uttering a prayer in each circuit, ending the ritual by praying and running or walking seven times between the hills of Safa and Marwah. The next day the pilgrims leave for Mount Arafat, where they stand in contemplative vigil and pray and recite the Qur'an. The night is spent sleeping on the ground of Muzdalifah. The day after, the pilgrims throw stones to signify their defiance of the Devil at the largest pillar known as Jamrat'al'Aqabah. When the seven stones have been thrown, the pilgrims slaughter animals to commemorate the story of Abraham and Ishmael. The pilgrimage is almost over, but some tasks still remain.
translation: 朝觐礼中，朝圣者先环游天房，即以左旋绕行天房七圈；再山间奔走，即于沙花与麦华两丘之间步行七趟以作结，二礼期间高念赞词。翌日，朝圣者即前往亚拉花山行晌礼和晡礼，并站山高诵祷文及古兰经文；并于黄昏前往穆士达利花山行昏礼和宵礼，并席地而寝.过后一晨，朝圣者赶往美纳山行大射礼，即向魔鬼三柱中最大的阿盖白石柱投石，以示蔑视魔鬼.当七石皆已投完，他们即宰牲献祭，以记念易卜拉欣与易斯马仪的事迹.至此，朝圣之礼接近完毕，但仍有些主命未行。

original: Good
The End of Hajj

The second-to-last ritual is to re-visit the Masjid al-Haram mosque in Mecca to walk around the Kaaba once more. It is called Tawaf al-Ifadah, which symbolizes being in a hurry to respond to God and show love for Him. Before leaving Mecca, pilgrims perform a farewell tawaf called the Tawaf al-Wida. Some pilgrims, including the ruler of $COUNTRY$, travel to the city of Medina and the Al-Masjid al-Nabawi, which contains the Prophet Muhammad's tomb.
translation: 朝觐完结前尾二之事，就是再到到禁寺涌游，即再环游天房，以示敬爱并急欲回应真主.最后，离开麦加前，朝圣者会再环游天房，此为辞朝.之后，$COUNTRY$元首更如一些朝圣者，顺道前往麦地那城参观圣寺，以谒先知穆圣之陵。

original: The Hajj is over
Repairing the Masjid al-Haram

The greatest mosque of the world, the Masjid al-Haram, surrounds one of the holiest places of Islam, the Kaaba, to which all able-bodied Muslims at least once in their lifetime travel to, to perform Hajj. It was the first house built for humanity to worship Allah. Its wooden columns have been replaced with marble columns and a minaret has been added. A humble architect, one Mimar Sinan, has approached us and told us of his plans of replacing the flat roof with domes decorated with calligraphy internally.
translation: 世界上最宏伟的清真寺——麦加禁寺，围绕着伊斯兰教至圣之地——天房：所有能力许可之穆斯林，在有生之年须往朝觐之地；也是人类首座建以敬奉真主之楼.其木制梁柱现已换为大理石柱，而其上亦多建宣礼塔一座。一位名为米马尔·希南的谦逊建筑师，现向朝廷提议改建禁寺之平顶为对内饰有书法之穹顶。

original: Repair the mosque and hire Mimar Sinan
translation: 雇用米马尔·希南以修缮禁寺

original: Follow Mimar Sinan's suggestions and repair the mosque
translation: 采用其意见以修缮禁寺

original: Do nothing
Suhrawardiyya

The Sufi order founded by Abu al-Najib Suhrawardi is a strictly Sunni order that is guided by the Shafi'i school of Islamic law. Though it has existed since the 11th century, it has had a small revival these last years and has played an important role in the formation of a conservative new piety. Futuwwas, being guilds that emphasize honesty, peacefulness, gentleness, generosity, avoidance of complaint and hospitality in life, has also been brought back to life by the Suhrawardiyya.
translation: 由阿布·纳吉布·苏哈拉瓦迪建立的苏菲教团，是一个沙斐仪学派的伊斯兰法指导下的严格逊尼派教团.尽管它自十一世纪起已经存在，近年来却有复兴之像，并在保守的「新虔诚」的形成中起到了关键作用。富图瓦——一个强调在生活中实践诚实、和睦、温文、慷慨、避怨与好客的公会——也在苏哈拉瓦迪的提倡下重现世间。

original: Their work is admirable, we should support them
It is fine what they do, but we want no part of it
Ban Alcohol, Coffee and Tobacco?

A wise and pious sultan of the Ottomans, Murad IV, managed to quell the corruption that had grown during the reigns of previous sultans with policy changes such as limiting wasteful spending. His most pious commands, though, was to ban alcohol, tobacco and coffee in Constantinople. To enforce the banishment, he patrolled the streets and taverns of Constantinople in civilian clothes at night, ordering execution for all who broke the ban. A ruthless supporter of alcohol prohibition, yet Murad IV was partial to drinking and wrote poems about his thirst. 'Even if the rivers became wine, they wouldn't fill my glass' - 'The wine is such a devil that I have to protect my people from it by drinking all of it'.
translation: 奥斯曼帝国有一位睿智又敬主的苏丹穆拉德四世，试图以新政荡平帝国先前的积腐，如限制资源运用.然而，其最为可嘉的命令，在于查禁都成之酒类，烟草与咖啡.为了确行禁令，他甚至微服出巡以检查街巷与客栈，并处决所有犯禁者。尽管对在禁酒之事上心狠手辣，他个人却是好酒贪杯，甚至以渴为诗——「纵河为酒，难充我杯」；「美酒邪物，停饮卫民」。

original: Follow Murad IV's pious ways
Increase the tax on those goods
I do not wish to enforce these morals upon others
Aurangzeb's Morals

Aurangzeb, the sixth Mughal Emperor, was famous for enforcing morals and banned the consumption, usage and practices of alcoholism, gambling, castration, servitude, eunuchs, music, nautch (a special dance) and narcotics in the Mughal Empire. Though he might have went a bit far in his obsession, among other things he ordered the punishment of Muslims who dressed like non-Muslims, some of his ideas might increase the piety of the population of $COUNTRY$.
translation: 奥朗则布，第六任莫卧儿皇帝，闻名于其在涤瑕荡秽上之行峻言厉：如禁酒、赌、毒、阉、奴、宦、乐、舞（丑舞，北印度一种庙舞）。尽管他某些命令——如严惩穿异教衣着的穆斯林——可能是矫枉过正，但他的一些措施的确可使$COUNTRY$人民更为虔诚。

original: Follow Aurangzeb's ideas
Just increase the tax on alcohol
He sounds like a mad man!
Muhammad Salih Tahtawi - The Celestial Globe
translation: 穆罕默德·萨利赫·达哈达威——天球仪

original: A massive, seamless celestial globe inscribed with Arabic and Persian inscriptions was presented to the court today. Muhammad Salih Tahtawi, the metallurgist, astronomer, geometric expert and craftsman used a secret wax casting method to create the celestial globe. He is certain that he will be able to reproduce this feat in metallurgy and create many more celestial globes for $COUNTRY$.
translation: 今天，一个饰以阿拉伯与波斯铭刻的巨型无缝天球仪被呈上了朝廷。一位身兼冶金、天文及几何权威的工匠，穆罕默德·萨利赫·达哈达威，利用一种秘密蜡铸法制作了这个天球仪。他言之凿凿，指自己必能再现这冶金创举，并为$COUNTRY$制作无数天球仪。

original: Accept the globe and urge him to create more
translation: 收下天球仪并命他制作更多

original: Offer him a place at court as an advisor to the $MONARCHTITLE$
translation: 给他在宫廷作$MONARCHTITLE$顾问的机会

original: Mian Mir

A religious dilemma has cropped up and the advisors at court are baffled. The only true advice any of them uttered was, 'Mian Mir, the Sufi saint in Lahore, could possibly help.'. Mian Mir, famous for shunning worldly, selfish men, covetous Emirs and ambitious Nawabs who ran after faqirs to get their blessings but a friend of those who love God, is not easy to approach. His mureeds, his disciples, are posted at the gate of his house to stop those he does not wish to see. The pious ruler of $COUNTRY$, though, is one Mian Mir would accept and advise.
translation: 一项宗教事务上的两难，乍然惊现，使朝廷众顾问百思不得其解。他们的「意见」里唯一有用的就是：「米安·米尔先生，拉合尔的一位苏菲派圣人，定能相助。」米安·米尔——闻名于其躲避世俗各种为受祝福而对长老追不舍的自私男女、鄙吝官吏与壮志王公，而只对真正奉神者友善——并不易接近。其家门前有其穆里德——门人—贴岗，以杜绝他不待见之人。尽管如此，虔诚的$COUNTRY$元首，绝对是米安·米尔能接受并给予建议之人。

original: Offer him a place at court
Ask him for advice
Find another solution to the problem
Ayazmakapi Fire

A great fire in Istanbul has destroyed the Jewish quarters, and it is decided that the burnt-out quarters is to be compulsory purchased by the state. The Jewish merchants protest against this and aim to change this policy by offering the Grand Vizier a large monetary bribe from their 'Accidents and Emergencies Fund'. The Grand Vizier has told the $MONARCHTITLE$ what the Jewish merchants offered to avoid the compulsory purchase and awaits an answer.
translation: 伊斯坦堡的一场大火使犹太区付诸一炬，而国家决定强制征购该区。然而，犹太商人对此极力抗议，并尝试以其「应急储备」中之大量现金贿赂首席大臣。首席大臣已向$MONARCHTITLE$上报犹太商人之开价，正静候回音。

original: Accept their bribes
translation: 接受赂金并撒回征地令

original: Refuse the bribes and punish the bribers
translation: 拒绝赂金并严惩行贿者

original: Chishti Order

Known for its emphasis on love, tolerance, and openness, the Chishti Order has spread to the provinces of $COUNTRY$ and their welcoming attitude to seekers who belong to other religions may prove a way to convert more people to Islam. They are rather strict in their belief that a Chishti teacher should not attend the court or be involved in matters of state, as this will corrupt the soul with worldly matters. Some Muslims believe that music is haram, forbidden, while the practitioners of Chishti believe that song or listening to music can evoke the divine presence.
translation: 因重视神爱、宽容与开放而知名的契斯堤教团，已经备播至$COUNTRY$的省份，而其对异教徒来者不拒的态度，可能是使更多人皓依真主的良法。该团坚守导师不可上朝或干政之规，因为世俗之事将败坏灵魂。同时，与一些穆斯林相信音乐是非法的，教义禁止之行不同，契斯堤团员相信，唱歌或听乐，是唤醒神圣临在之法。

original: Accept the Chishti Order
Expel them from $COUNTRY$!
Qadiriyya

The Qadiriyya is an influential Sunni institution and Qadiri dervishes wear a rose of green and white cloth with a six-pointed star in the middle in their caps. The struggle against the desires of the ego is emphasized by the Qadiriyya's teachings. The two stages of the greater struggle are firstly deeds forbidden by religious law and second against fundamental vices such as greed, vanity, and fear. 'A true seeker of God should overcome all desires other than wishing to be taken into God's custody.' is a well known saying from the teachings of the Qadiriyya.
translation: 卡迪里教团是一个举足轻重的逊尼派组织，其托僧皆于帽内放置一朵绿玫瑰及一块中央画有六角星之白布.此团之教诲强调与自我抗争——其中大抗争有两步：先是教法禁止之恶行；再是人生而有之根性，如贪、傲与惧。「真正寻真主者，应当根除欲望，而非盼主庇佑」是该团教诲之中的名句。

original: Their teachings are true, I will give them my support
translation: 其教诲言之有理，我将支持他们

original: We can learn nothing from them
Sharia Laws

The moral code and religious law of Islam deals with many topics, such as crime, politics, economics but also personal matters such as sexual intercourse, hygiene, diet, prayer, and fasting. It is considered the infallible law of God and there are two sources of the law. The first is the precepts set forth in the Qur'an, and the example set by the prophet Muhammad in the Sunnah. Qadis and imams are complaining about the lax maintenance of the Sharia law in $COUNTRY$ and insist that the $MONARCHTITLE$ make sure that the law is enforced, at all times.
translation: 伊斯教的道德与教法涵盖各种议题，由国事如政治、经济、罪行至私事像房事、卫生、祷告与斋戒都受规限.人们认为教法是神的金科玉律，而这些律法主要来自两处：一是《古兰经》提出的训诫，二是大先知做过的圣行。教法官与法学家都对$COUNTRY$内教法未受切实执行而怨声载道，并坚持要$MONARCHTITLE$务必每时每刻都严行教法。

original: Stricter Sharia laws
Less strict Sharia laws
Ghulams

Formerly the slave-soldiers of $COUNTRY$ were trained and educated at their master's expense, serving him in any capacity he wished for. Most of them were soldiers, some were administrators but they all had converted to Islam. Some of them still linger in $COUNTRY$, without a master and searching for some way to bring meaning back into their lives. The ghulams have even sent a deputy to the $MONARCHTITLE$, asking if they may find service in $COUNTRY$.
translation: 以前$COUNTRY$内的奴主自费培训与教育奴隶为兵，使奴兵可任他差遣，基至赴汤蹈火。他们之中大多是士兵，亦有些监军；然而，他们都已皈依真主。其中一些人仍未寻获新主人，便在$COUNTRY$逗留，试着使生命重获意义。他们甚至派代表觐见$MONARCHTITLE$，询问是否能奉事$COUNTRY$。

original: Give them administrative work
Hire them as soldiers
Let them aid the diplomatic corps
Reza Abbasi

The people of $CAPITAL$ is talking about an especially beautiful miniature in a muraqqa, a book filled with Islamic miniature paintings and specimens of Islamic calligraphy. The man who painted the miniature is Reza Abbasi, son of the miniature artist Ali Asghar. The miniature in question is a beautiful youth reading under a tree.
translation: $CAPITAL$市民都在谈论一本穆勒卡——一本充满伊斯兰细密画与书法样本的图册——它里面一幅精妙绝伦的细密画：画中是一位少年在树下阅读的雅姿。使人议论纷纷的画作，正正出自细密画家阿里·阿斯贾之子，礼萨·阿巴斯之手。

original: We could use his talents at court
Support him and his art
Make sure everyone knows of his talent!
Baha al-din al-Amili

A fascinating new idea, that the sun is the center of the Universe and the Earth rotates around it in a circular path has been spreading due to the teachings of the scholar, philosopher, architect, mathematician, astronomer and poet Baha al-din al-Amili. His book Tashrih al-aflak or 'Anatomy of the celestial spheres' affirms the view that supports the positional rotation of the Earth.
translation: 一种天马行空，指太阳为宇宙中心而地球绕其转动的学说，正因巴哈丁·阿米利——一位身兼学者、哲学与建筑家的诗人——的教授而传播开去.其作《天体剖释》证实了其对地动说的支持。

original: His talents are needed at court
He shall have our support
Ignore him
Convert Hagia Sophia into a Mosque
translation: 改建上帝圣智教堂为清真寺

original: Byzantine Emperor Justinian I built Hagia Sophia in 532, choosing Isidore of Miletus and Anthemius of Tralles to be the architects. The church was built with Hellenistic columns from the Temple of Artemis at Ephesus, large stones from quarries in porphyry from Egypt, green marble from Thessaly, black stone from the Bosporus region, and yellow stone from Syria. That a Christian church is still in use does not please the people, who wish it to be transformed into a mosque. It is also in dire need of renovation, and should be repaired before it is made into a mosque.
translation: 于公元532年，东罗马皇帝查士丁尼一世命米利都的伊西多尔和特拉勒斯的安提莫斯建立了上帝圣智教堂。教堂以各地物料建造：古希腊圆柱来自以弗所阿蒂蜜丝神庙、大石则来自远方众石矿——包括埃及的斑岩、色萨利的绿色大理石、博斯普鲁斯海峡一带的黑石及叙利亚的黄石。市民对一座基督教堂仍被使用感到不满，且希望改建其为清真寺；同时，此残破教堂亦急需整修，因此若却改为清真寺，必须先行修理它。

original: Repair it and transform it!
Leave it be
Madrassa

Madrassa, meaning 'A place where learning and studying is done', teaches tafsir or Qur'anic interpretation, shari'ah or Islamic law, hadiths or recorded sayings and deeds of Prophet Muhammad and mantiq or logic. Some madrassas also teaches mathematics, astronomy, astrology, geography, alchemy, philosophy, magic and occultism. The future of the land lies in the hand of the children, and to be able to trust them with the country it is best to educate them and make sure their knowledge of the world will never fail them.
translation: 伊斯兰宗教学校——阿拉伯语称玛德拉萨，意为「教学之地」——对学生讲授经注学（塔夫细尔）、回教法（沙里亚）、圣训（哈底斯）和逻辑（满提克）.其中有些也教授数学、天文、占星、地理、炼金、哲学、魔法与秘学。为了将国家安心托付予未来社会的栋梁——孩童，最佳的方法便是悉心教育以使他们了解世界，确保彼等免于失败。

original: Establish madrassas in the whole country
translation: 于全国各省设立伊斯兰宗教学校

original: Establish madrassas in a few, select provinces
translation: 于指定数省设立伊斯兰宗教学校

original: Do nothing
Zubaidah bint Ja'far

A woman has requested an audience in our court, and after allowing her to address the $MONARCHTITLE$ she asked to be allowed to erect wells, reservoirs and artificial pools along the route to Mecca and Medina to provide water for the Muslim pilgrims. Her name is Zubaidah bint Ja'far, wife of one of the Muslim rulers nearby.
translation: 一女要求入宫觐见$MONARCHTITLE$。在获准进言后，她要求获允沿往麦加与麦地那之道修建井、塘与池，以供水给往朝圣之弟兄饮用。此女之名为祖柏妲·宾特·加法尔，是一邻近穆斯林君主之妻。

original: Allow her to pass through our provinces
Help her with her holy work!
Remove her from my country!
Serafeddin Sabuncuoglu

Although he is an old man now, the surgeon and physician Serafeddin Sabuncuoglu still practices medicine in the Amasya Hospital that was built in 1308, almost eighty years before he was born. Serafeddin Sabuncuoglu's 'Imperial Surgery' is the first surgical atlas, based on the book 'Al Tasrif' by Abu al-Qasim al-Zahrawi. One of the surgical techniques described in the 'Imperial Surgery' is the ligating of the temporal artery for migraine.
translation: 尽管年纪老迈，医官兼药师谢拉夫丁·萨本久奥卢仍在1308年——他出生前八十年——建成的阿马西亚医院行医。他基于阿布·卡塞姆·宰赫拉威所著的《医学宝鉴》，编写了世界首本外科学专著《帝国手术》。此书所叙述的技术，更包括藉结扎颞动脉以医治偏头痛。

original: Bring him to my court!
With our help, he shall be able to practice medicine for many more years
translation: 若我们相助，他应可行医更久

original: So?
Al-Birjandi

Al-Birjandi is a brilliant astronomer, mathematician and physicist whose answer to one of Qutb al-Din al-Shirazi's arguments was this: 'The small or large rock will fall to the Earth along the path of a line that is perpendicular to the plane (sath) of the horizon, this is witnessed by experience (tajriba). And this perpendicular is away from the tangent point of the Earth's sphere and the plane of the perceived (hissi) horizon. This point moves with the motion of the Earth and thus there will be no difference in place of fall of the two rocks.'. He has written many books, including Sharh al-tadhkirah or 'A commentary on al-Tusi's memoir' discussing astronomical elements.
translation: 比里安迪是一位出类拔萃的天文、数学与物理学者.他曾如此回应库特布·丁·设拉子的理论：「据经验所得，大小岩石都会沿与地平面垂直的路径跌落，而这条垂线处于地球表面的切点与地平面的中间。该点随地球转动而移动，所以两块石头落地的路径相同。」他写有不少书藉，包括探讨天文原理的《图思传记述评》。

original: This is a man I need as an advisor!
I will support his work
Who is this? Why should I care?
People of the Book - Dhimmi of [Root.GetName]

The People of the Book - the Christians, the Jews and the Sabians - recognize the God of Abraham as the one and only god, as do Muslims, and they practice revealed faiths based on divine ordinances. The population of [Root.GetName] are almost all Dhimi and while they are afforded the usual things related to this status in a Muslim realm many of them feel our state could be more forthcoming given how rich the region is. It has been suggested that we make even more favorable conditions for the Dhimi of [Root.GetName] as it would be in our own best interest to encourage such a prosperous region to grow.
translation: 有经者——基督徒、犹太教徒与拜星教徒——都如穆斯林一般相信亚伯拉罕的神是唯一真神，都是基于神的法令来践行信仰。[Root.GetName]的民众几乎都是齐米，尽管基于这样的状况，他们在一个穆斯林国家获得了平等待遇，但他们中的很多人仍然认为如此富足的地域应该给他们更多权益。他们建议我国为[Root.GetName]的齐米提供更有利的条件，如此一来，我们也会在支持如此繁荣的地方继续繁华下去的过程中获得最大的利益。

original: Let us favor their presence here.
Convert them, remove them - erase them!
translation: 感化他们、除去他们——消灭他们！

original: Mahdi

A man is claiming to be the Mahdi, the prophesied redeemer of Islam who will rule for seven years before the Day of Judgment. He promises to rid the world of evil and re-establish righteousness. Disbelievers who claim that the man is not the Mahdi have angered his followers and the country is in uproar.
translation: 某人声称为马赫迪，圣训预言中将于大审判前七年统治世界的救世者，并保证铲除暴虐，伸张正义.然而，不信者指他非并马赫迪的言论却触怒了其追随者，使全国上下鸡犬不宁。

original: Accept him as the prophesied redeemer of Islam
translation: 接受他为圣训中的教世者

original: Reject him and expose him as a fraud
translation: 拒绝并揭发这骗子的胡话

original: Shiite and Sunni

Any true Shiite knows that only the heirs of the fourth caliph, Ali, are the legitimate successors of Mohammed. The Sunni believe that the first four caliphs - Mohammed's successors - rightfully took his place as the leaders of Muslims and they recognize the heirs of the four caliphs as legitimate religious leaders. We have not lived under the authority of a legitimate religious figure since the Twelfth Imam disappeared in 931. The tension between the Sunni and the Shiite in $COUNTRY$ has grown over the years and it is only due to the diplomatic corps that nothing has happened, yet.
translation: 真正的什叶穆斯林都知道，唯有第四任哈里发阿里的子嗣，才是穆圣的合法继承者.自第十二代伊玛目于931年失踪，我们已从未获得正统宗教领袖领导。然而，逊尼派却相信首四任哈里发——穆罕默德的后继者——都是正当地继承了领导广大穆斯林的宗教地位，而四哈里发众子嗣都是正统宗教领袖。$COUNTRY$的什叶派与逊尼派教徒积怨已久，剑拔弩张，只因外交斡旋才未致惹事。

original: Ignore the problem
Find a way to ease the tension between them
Sunni and Shiite

Any true Sunni knows that the first four caliphs - Mohammed's successors - rightfully took his place as the leaders of Muslims and the heirs of the four caliphs as legitimate religious leaders. The Shiite's believe that only the heirs of the fourth caliph, Ali, are the legitimate successors of Mohammed and that there has been no legitimate religious figure since the Twelfth Imam disappeared in 931. The tension between the Shiite and the Sunni in $COUNTRY$ has grown over the years and it is only due to the diplomatic corps that nothing has happened, yet.
translation: 真正的逊尼穆斯林都知道首四任哈里发——穆罕默德的后继者——都是正当地继承了领导广大穆斯林的宗教地位，而四哈里发众子嗣都是正统宗教领袖。然而什叶派却相信只有第四任哈里发阿里才是先知的合法继承者，而正统宗教领袖已自第十二代伊玛目于931年失踪而失传。$COUNTRY$的逊尼派与什叶派教徒积怨已久，剑拔弩张，只因外交斡旋才未致惹事。

original: Hajj
The Hajj is a pilgrimage to Mecca and the Kaaba, one of the Five Pillars of Islam and a religious duty. Every able-bodied Muslim who can afford to go on Hajj is required to do so at least once.
translation: 朝觐，既到麦加天房朝圣，除了是伊斯兰五功之一，更是一项宗教义务。若家境允许，任何身体健全的穆斯林都必须在有生之年亲临圣城至少一次。

original: Completed Hajj
The Hajj is completed. Your ruler has made a pilgrimage to Mecca and the Kaaba, completing one of the Five Pillars of Islam.
translation: 朝觐已成.贵国国君经已亲临麦加天房朝圣，完成了伊斯兰五功之最。\n

original: Repaired the Masjid al Haram
The Masjid al Haram in Mecca surrounds the Kaaba, the one of the holiest places of Islam.
translation: 环绕天房的麦加禁寺，是伊斯兰教至圣之地。

original: Banned Alcohol, Tobacco and Coffee
Alcohol, tobacco and coffee have been banned in our capital as well as the whole country.
translation: 自君士坦丁堡至全国各地，烟草、咖啡及酒类皆已遭到查禁。

original: Taxed Alcohol, Tobacco and Coffee
translation: 向烟草、咖啡及酒类征税

original: A heavy tax on alcohol, tobacco and coffee has been introduced.
translation: 我国已对烟草、咖啡及酒类课以重税。

original: Celestial Globe
The Celestial Globe, inscribed with Arabic and Persian inscriptions, was made by the metallurgist, astronomer, geometric expert and craftsman Muhammad Salih Tahtawi.
translation: 一位名为穆罕默德·萨利赫·达哈达威的工匠，身兼冶金、天文及几何权威，并制作了饰以阿拉伯及波斯铭刻的精美天球仪。

original: Mian Mir
The wise Sufi saint Mian Mir sound advice about religious matters are highly appreciated.
translation: 睿智的苏菲派圣人米安·米尔总能在宗教事务上给予金玉良言。

original: Reza Abbasi
The famous miniature artist Reza Abbasi is sponsored by the benevolent ruler of the country.
translation: 名扬四海的细密画家礼萨·阿巴斯正受我国明君赞助。

original: Baha al-din al-Amili
Our benevolent ruler has decided to sponsor the scholar, philosopher, architect, mathematician, astronomer and poet Baha al-din al-Amili.
translation: 我国明君已决定赞助巴哈丁·阿米利，一位身兼诗人、哲学家、建筑学家、数学家及天文学身份的学者。

original: Madrassa

All over the country new madrassas are being built, to teach students tafsir or Qur'anic interpretation, shari'ah or Islamic law, hadiths or recorded sayings and deeds of Prophet Muhammad and mantiq or logic.
translation: 伊斯兰学校正如雨后春笋于全国各地涌现，以教导学生经注学（塔夫细尔）、回教法（沙里亚）、圣训（哈底斯）和逻辑（满提克）。

original: Provincial Madrassas

A couple selected provinces are building madrassas, where students will be taught tafsir or Qur'anic interpretation, shari'ah or Islamic law, hadiths or recorded sayings and deeds of Prophet Muhammad and mantiq or logic.
translation: 某些指定省份正建造伊斯兰宗教学校，以教导学生经注学（塔夫细尔）、回教法（沙里亚）、圣训（哈底斯）和逻辑（满提克）.

original: Darb Zubaidah

The Darb Zubaidah, or Zubaidah's Way, is being built through the country. It is a series of wells, reservoirs and artificial pools that will provide water for Muslim pilgrims traveling to Mecca and Medina.
translation: 一条贯穿全国前往麦加的祖拜旦之路（或名达布祖拜旦）正在营建。此路上有众多井、塘与池，以供水予前往麦地那与麦加朝圣之回教弟兄。

original: Serafeddin Sabuncuoglu
With the benevolent ruler sponsoring Serafeddin Sabuncuoglu, the old surgeon and physician will be able to spend his time on the surgical atlas called 'Imperial Surgery'.
translation: 经由我国明君赞助，谢拉夫丁·萨本久奥卢这位老医官和药师终于能埋身编写名为《帝国手术》的外科学专著了。

original: Al-Birjandi
Al-Birjandi, the brilliant astronomer, mathematician and physicist is being sponsored by our benevolent ruler.
translation: 比里安迪，一位出类拔萃的天文、数学与物理学者，已得到我国明君赞助。

original: Dhimmi

The People of the Book - the Christians, the Jews and the Sabians - are protected under the Dhimmi, and are allowed rights of residence in return for taxes. Nowhere is this more true than in this area where we have made accommodations for the very rich Dhimi community.
translation: 有经者——基督徒、犹太教徒与拜星教徒——都受到齐米制度的保护，他们被允许通过缴税来换取居留权。这一条没有什么地方比这里执行的更到位，我们在这里为非常富有的齐米社区划分了专门的居住地。

original: True Mahdi
The Mahdi has come, the prophesied redeemer of Islam. He will rule for seven years before the Day of Judgment, ridding the world of evil and re-establishing righteousness.
translation: 真正的马赫迪，圣训预言中的救世者，经已降临。他将于大审判前七年统治世界，并铲除暴虐，伸张正义。

original: Invited to Eid al-Fitr
Unify Islam

The Unification of Islam is a political unity of the entire community of Muslim faithful, ruled by a single ruler. The head of state and other officials are the voices of the people and of Islam and must govern according to the Sharia law.
translation: 伊斯兰的一统是指一位君主将广大穆斯林社会统合为一个国家，以达致政治上的统一.国家元首和各官同时代表了民众与宗教，且必须按伊斯兰教法治国。

original: A United Islam
The People of Islam are united and are forgetting their internal differences in favor of a merciful nation.
translation: 为了建立一个和谐国度，各派穆斯林戮力同心，消除隔阂。

original: Change Religion to Sunni

The difference between the Sunni and the Shiite is that the Sunni believes that the first four caliphs - Mohammed's successors - rightfully took his place as the leaders of Muslims. Meanwhile, the Shiites believe that only the heirs of the fourth caliph, Ali, are the legitimate successors of Mohammed.
translation: 逊尼与什叶之差，在于前者相信首四任哈里发，穆罕默德的后继者，是正当地继承了领导广大穆斯林的宗教地位；然而，后者却相信唯有第四任哈里发阿里，才是先知的合法继承者。

original: Change Religion to Shiite

The Shiites believe that only the heirs of the fourth caliph, Ali, are the legitimate successors of Mohammed while the Sunni believes that the first four caliphs - Mohammed's successors - rightfully took his place as the leaders of Muslims.
translation: 什叶派相信唯有第四任哈里发阿里，才是先知的合法继承者；而逊尼派却认为首四任哈里发，穆罕默德的后继者，皆是正当地继承了领导广大穆斯林的宗教地位。
